entry.title: 3M SJ3571-1-1/2X50-BK - Sj3571 Black Loop 1 1/2 x 50 Yd Bulk Sj3571-1-1/2x50-Bk 7000029603
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type:
Price: 2.40

[shortdesc]

SJ3571 BLACK LOOP 1 1/2 X 50 YD BULK

  • 3M™ Loop Fastener SJ3571 is one part of a two-part fastener solution designed to provide great durability for thousands of closures
  • With its high-performance, acrylic-based, pressure-sensitive adhesive backing, this fastener allows for easy and convenient attachment to a variety of substrates, including some high surface energy plastics such as polycarbonate, acrylic, ABS, polystyrene.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Origin Country South Korea

    Product Information

  • When paired with 3M™ Hook Fasteners, provides durability for thousands of openings and closures
  • Woven nylon loop fastener provides great design flexibility and fast product assembly
  • High-performance, acrylic-based adhesive offers excellent shear strength, chemical and solvent resistance, and bonds to a variety of substrates
  • Alternative solution to zippers, screws, snaps and more
  • Temperature-resistant up to 200°F (93°C)
  • For indoor or outdoor use
  • Colour: Black

entry.title: 3M SJ3402-1X50-WHT - 3M Hook Fastener SJ3402 SJ3402-1X50-WHT 7010382015
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type:
Price: 48.90

[shortdesc]

3M Hook Fastener SJ3402

  • 3M™ Hook Fastener SJ3402 is one part of a two-part fastener solution designed to provide great durability for thousands of closures
  • This non-adhesive fastener is most commonly sewn, but can be attached with a variety of hot melt or liquid adhesives
  • This fastener allows for easy and convenient attachment to a variety of substrates
  • It is an attachment alternative to a wide variety of closures, including zippers, screws, snaps, hooks and more
  • This fastener is covered with flexible, J-shaped hooks, with about 300 hooks per square inch (46 hooks per square cm) that protrude up from a woven backing
  • Commonly paired with 3M™ Loop Fastener SJ3401, this hook fastener can also engage with other 3M™ Loop Fasteners
  • To ensure stability and flatness, both the hook and the corresponding loop are preshrunk.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Origin Country South Korea

    Product Information

  • When paired with 3M™ Loop Fasteners, this reclosable fastener provides durability for thousands of openings and closures
  • Woven nylon hook fastener provides great design flexibility and fast product assembly
  • No adhesive or liner allows for attaching by sewing or with hot melt or liquid adhesives
  • Alternative solution to zippers, screws, snaps and more
  • Temperature-resistant up to 200°F (93°C)
  • Good for both indoor and outdoor use
  • Colour: Black
    		•

entry.title: 3M Dual Lock SJ3542-6X50 - Reclosable Fastener SJ3542 SJ3542-6X50 7010312616
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type:
Price: 2143.70

[shortdesc]

3M Dual Lock Reclosable Fastener SJ3542

  • 3M™ Dual Lock™ Reclosable Fastener SJ3542 is the easy and clear alternative to traditional fastening methods, such as screws, nuts or bolts
  • It is designed to deliver a durable, reclosable fastening solution (which can be opened and closed multiple times) which bonds to a variety of substrates including many plastics and low surface energy materials
  • Durable and secure, 3M™ Dual Lock™ Reclosable Fastener SJ3542 has exceptional strength through its interlocking mushroom-shaped heads (170 stem density per square inch), providing up to 5X the tensile strength of typical hook-and-loop products
  • We designed this fastener with a synthetic rubber-based black PE foam tape protected by a removable, film liner
  • This pressure-sensitive adhesive features quick stick and a short dwell time
  • With 3M™ Dual Lock™ Reclosable Fastener SJ3542, there is no need for any drilling, screwing or sewing tools which makes for quick installation.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Line Dual Lock
    Adhesive Type Rubber
    Color Black
    Width 6 Inch
    Origin Country United States

    Product Information

  • 170 stem density per square inch
  • Interlocking mushroom-shaped heads provide strong, reliable and durable fastening that can be opened and closed multiple times
  • Backed with a rubber-based, pressure-sensitive adhesive
  • Designed to bond to many plastics, powder-coated paints and other low surface energy materials
  • Temperature-resistant up to 120°F (49°C)
  • Strong fastener secures with an audible snap, verifying closure
  • Best suited for indoor use
  • Colour: Black

Vendor: 3M
Type: Fasteners
Price: 128.78

[shortdesc]

3M Fastener SJ3518FR Loop Flame Resistant, Black, 5/8 in x 50 yd

  • 3M™ Flame-Resistant Loop Fastener SJ3518FR is one part of a two-part fastener solution designed to provide great durability for thousands of closures
  • With its flame resistant, rubber-based, pressure-sensitive adhesive backing, this fastener features high-temperature performance and bonds wells to paper and cardboard, paint, bare and painted metal, glass, sealed wood and many plastics.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Color Black
    Length 50yds
    Width 5/8 Inch
    Origin Country South Korea
    Product Type Fasteners

    Product Information

  • Provides durability for thousands of openings and closures for great design flexibility and fast product assembly
  • Flame-resistant, rubber-based adhesive offers fast tack, good shear strength and bonds to a variety of substrates, including plastics
  • Alternative solution to zippers, screws, snaps and more
  • Temperature-resistant up to 158°F (70°C)
  • Best suited for applications where flame resistance is required
  • Colour: Beige

    • Suggested Application

  • Aerospace, electronics, construction, specialty vehicle, military, medical, furniture, general industrial applications
  • Securing fabric to furniture cushions, airplane seating, carpet panel attachments, uniforms, gloves and clothing
    		•

entry.title: 3M SJ3519-3/4X50-BLK - Fastener SJ3519FR Hook Flame Resistant S030 Black 3/4 Inch x 50 Yards 0.15mil 7000052230
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type: Fasteners
Price: 136.85

[shortdesc]

3M Flame Resistant Hook Fastener SJ3519FR S030, Black, 3/4 in x 50 yd

  • 3M™ Flame-Resistant Loop Fastener SJ3518FR is one part of a two-part fastener solution designed to provide great durability for thousands of closures
  • With its flame-resistant, rubber-based, pressure-sensitive adhesive backing, this fastener allows for easy and convenient attachment to a variety of substrates, including plastics
  • To ensure stability and flatness, both the hook and the corresponding loop are preshrunk.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Color Black
    Length 50yds
    Width 3/4 Inch
    Origin Country South Korea
    Product Type Fasteners

    Product Information

  • Loop fastener backed with a rubber-based adhesive for bonding to a wide variety of materials
  • Durable, flame-resistant woven nylon
  • Provides durability for thousands of openings and closures for great design flexibility and fast product assembly
  • Alternative solution to zippers, screws, snaps and more
  • Temperature-resistant up to 158°F (70°C)
  • Best suited for applications where flame resistance is required
  • Colour: Beige

    • Suggested Application

  • Securing fabric to furniture cushions
  • Indoor general industrial applications
  • Aerospace and rail industries

entry.title: 3M Dual Lock SJ3560-3/4INX50YD - Reclosable Fastener SJ3560 250 Clear 3/4 Inch x 50 Yards 7000051893
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type: Reclosable Fasteners
Price: 496.44

[shortdesc]

3M Dual Lock Reclosable Fastener SJ3560

  • 3M™ Dual Lock™ Reclosable Fastener SJ3560 is a convenient alternative to traditional fastening methods, such as screws, nuts or bolts
  • It is designed to deliver a durable, reclosable fastening solution which bonds to a variety of substrates including metals, glass and plastics such as acrylics, polycarbonate and ABS.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Line Dual Lock
    Adhesive Type Acrylic
    Color Clear
    Length 50yds
    Width 3/4 Inch
    Origin Country United States
    Product Type Reclosable Fasteners
    Stems per Square Inch Type 250

    Product Information

  • 250 stem density per square inch
  • Mates with Type 170, Type 250 or Type 400 stem densities to provide different strength combinations
  • Clear, acrylic tape bonds well to a variety of substrates including metals, glass and plastics such as acrylics, polycarbonate and ABS
  • An alternative to screws and bolts, this hidden fastener provides a snug fit and smooth aesthetic appearance
  • Features good temperature resistance of 220°F (104°C)
  • Strong fastener secures with an audible snap, verifying closure
  • Good for indoor and outdoor use
  • Colour: Clear

    • Suggested Application

  • Architectural panels
  • Graphic attachment
  • Specialty vehicles (interior attachments)
  • General industrial attachment
  • General industrial
  • Upholstery
  • Military
  • Window
